text: 39|22|appeal etearalute hrdayattin islam svikarikkan allahu visalata nalkukayum annane avan tanre raksitavinkal ninnulla prakasattilayirikkukayum ceytuvea (avan hrdayam katuttupeayavaneppeleyanea?) ennal allahuvinre smaranayil ninn akann hrdayannal katuttupeayavarkkakunnu nasam. attarakkar vyaktamaya durmargattilatre
